title: Luxurious, spacious 2BR/2BA condo just steps to Inman & Union Squares!
posting_body: ["Beautiful and spacious 2 bedroom 2 bathroom open layout third-floor condo, 1100 square feet, just minutes' walk to the restaurants, cafes, pubs, and shops of Union Square (plus the new Green Line T station) and Inman Square!", 'Pristine hardwood floors, central A/C, baseboard heat, floor-to-ceiling windowed doors opening to Juilet balcony.', "Stainless steel appliances and plentiful cabinets in the chef's kitchen.", 'In-unit washer/dryer and ample closet space.', "Rental includes TWO parking spots in Columbia Street garage next to the building, and two spots in the building's dedicated bicycle room.", 'This is a third-floor unit in a 4-story building constructed in 2009 by the esteemed designer, architect, and developer David Aposhian, with an elevator and a common roof deck with views of the Boston skyline.', 'Cats fine with pet deposit.', 'Available beginning August 1, 2022, with flexible lease start date: we care a lot about offering a great rental and are looking for great tenants.', "No broker's fee.", 'Happy to answer questions about the unit!']
